column3: It's cold today, but it {{c1::was}} colder yesterday.
We went to their house, but they {{c1::weren't}} at home.
Why {{c1::was}} she angry? Did I say something wrong?
I didn't like the hotel. The room {{c1::wasn't}} very clean.
How do you know what happened? You {{c1::weren't}} here.
Tell me about your holiday. What {{c1::was}} it like?
I couldn't find you. Where {{c1::were}} you?
I like your new shoes. {{c1::Were}} they expensive?
column4: was / wasn't / were / weren't / Was / Wasn't / Were / Weren't

column3: Anna went to bed early. She {{c1::was}} very tired.
